summary:
Solomon was an ancient Israeli king, succeeding his father, David. He ruled around 970-931 BCE and was known for his wisdom and wealth. According to the Bible, he built the First Temple in Jerusalem. After his death, Israel split into two kingdoms: Israel in the north and Judah in the south.

Many legends surround Solomon, including his magical powers. While some believe he was a real historical figure, scholars debate the extent of his reign and the accuracy of biblical descriptions of his empire's grandeur. He is also mentioned in the New Testament and the Quran.
title: Solomon
